title: New year, lets do this.
body:
First of all, happy what ever you guys celebrate at this time.
New year resolutions huh? I haven't thought of any.

Well that was untill I got a thank you from 1 guy, I helped him understand why hes in bronze and hes now working to getting into silver.
Its actually nice when you help someone and they listen.

So there are a few "League" resolutions I wanna make for this year.
First of all, try and get my main account into Plat.
If not/Maybe if I have time. Get my other account into Gold.

I also wanna play with my little brother more, as he is slowly enjoying league.

-------------------------

There are some other things I wanna work on aswell.
After I go to this weeding for my sister XD
Helping 1 guy learn form his mistakes has prompted me to try some things.

Now if any of you are bronze, Im willing to help much like I did for that guy.
Here is the reference of what I did.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

I want to help people get better at League -or as much as I can anyway-
I had an idea of doing a "How to support as X champion" series, where I explain how to play any champion as a support role.
-Legit support none of that bull crap and not peeling/warding etc-

-------------------------

So this year, I wanna help as many people as I can learn and enjoy this game. And maybe climb while im at it.
If anyone has any ideas on what I should do, and how I should go about feel free to yell at me.

Alrighty, so Good luck have fun.
From your humble acolyte of shurima.

hopefully this year will be just as good if not better then the last.

-------------------------
Additional stuff.
Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ

If you look, Ive made a promise with/for myslef that I will never ask anyone to "Like N Subscribe"
If I do good then people should like and do that on there own.

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/YaseiDoubutsu

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/YaseiDoubutsuXD/?ref=hl

replies.body: Hi happy new year! Do you main support? Or adc?

Happy days to you too.
I main the support role, which unfortunate isn't good for commentary vids XD but I wanna work on a How to support series.
Main roles go like this since you asked.
Support-
Top-
Jungle-
Mid- 
ADC-

You too, I saw you on the forums I think.
Well have fun in normals and try yo best.

>
> You too, I saw you on the forums I think.
> Well have fun in normals and try yo best.

nice vids

I need/want to do better.
What I wanna do this year is actually be pretty decent at this stuff.

ty doe?
